text: Koran - Poslaniye ot Allakha i rukovodstvo dlya lyudey, i uveshchevaniye, chtoby oni opasalis' nakazaniya Allakha. Pust' oni, strashas' nakazaniya i dumaya o mogushchestve Allakha, znayut, chto Vsevyshniy - Yedin, krome Nego net nikakogo bozhestva, i pust' razumnyye lyudi vspominayut o velichii ikh Gospoda i otkazyvayutsya ot togo, chto prinesot im gibel'
